modName: WIP - The Bride Armor - Kill Bill - CBBE
summary: This is an attempt at recreating the yellow suit from Kill Bill that the bride wears.
descriptionHtml:
== WORK IN PROGRESS ==

== DESCRIPTION ==
This is an armor mod that is based on the stats of the dark brotherhood armor (as real assassin armor should be).
It features the yellow suit that the bride wears in the movie Kill Bill.
If you\'ve seen the movie you will like it!
It is currently not upgradable, but I plan on fixing this.
It is based on CBBE with weigthsliders working.

== TODO ==
I hope to finish this todo list soon:
- fix some warp anomalies in the color map
- fix the msn texture so that it gives a more realistic depth to the armor itself
- add feature to upgrade the armor

== INSTALLATION ==
1) copy contents to skyrim installation directory
2) start skyrim launcher
3) click data files and enable the killbill plugin
4) use console commands to spawn the items (player.additem xxxxxxxx 1)
5) enjoy!

3* if you cannot click the data files option, find out how here:
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20111119180622AAzkDCS

4* to find the item codes, open the console with ~ and type in the following:
help \"the bride\" 0
   you wil get 1 result with an item code
author: wvh
